definition: Buddhist salutation or expression of faith (loanword from Sanskrit)/Taiwan pr. [na2 mo2]

sentences.english: Why do some people maintain that you have to add the two syllable "ná mó"?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼有人說“南無”兩個字一定要加上？

definition: Guanyin, the Bodhisattva of Compassion or Goddess of Mercy (Sanskrit Avalokiteśvara)
so I have heard (idiom)/the beginning clause of Buddha's quotations as recorded by his disciple, Ananda (Buddhism)
incantation (Sanskrit: dharani)/religious chant (promoting virtue and obstructing evil)
monk (Sanskrit: Sramana, originally refers to north India)/Buddhist monk
Prince Ananda, cousin of the Buddha and his closest disciple
Mile county in Honghe Hani and Yi autonomous prefecture, Yunnan/Maitreya, the future Bodhisattva, to come after Shakyamuni Buddha
(of a deity) to take a material shape/to appear
